name: TargetedScan
overview: Adds POST /Library/ScanPath endpoint for targeted library scanning without full library scans
description: Allows external tools like Autopulse, Sonarr, or Radarr to trigger a targeted library scan for a specific filesystem path. Creates new items (Series, Season, Episode) instantly using ResolvePath + CreateItem, then queues metadata refresh. No full library scan needed.

versions.changelog: Per-parent locking for parallel creates, FindByPath cache across batches, extract walk-up before lock
